summary:
Now Breezehome lives up to it\'s name !!! 
Makes the windows \"see through\" and adds two bigger windows in the living room, with curtains. Let me know if you like and indorse.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Breezehome Open Windows II
Version: 2
Creator: KnightRangersGuild
My other cool mod....http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23317

Description-----Now Breezehome lives up to it\'s name !!! 
Makes the windows \"see through\" and adds two bigger windows in the living room, with curtains. This mod has been cleaned and tested with 195 mods.
 Let me know if you like and indorse.


Install---------1. This should work fine with NMM.
2. Manual download- Extract the files to a temporary location. Copy the files to \\Skyrim\\Data\\ or steam steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data


Uninstall-------Uncheck and delete


Conflict-ions----Don\'t think so I\'ve cleaned this mod and tested it with 195 mods.


Known Issue-----None that I know of.


Notes-----------I\'m going to release a version without glass and blowing curtains.
This is different from the old version. That version had to many bugs and dirty edits so just delete that one and use this one, 
here\'s the link to the old one....http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17396



Credits---------Thanks to Bethesda for creating Such wicked cool games like *Skyrim*, Morrowind, Oblivion, all the construction kits.


Legal crap------If you want to mess around with it It\'s cool but throw me the credit and I think I would rather you ask first before you 
upload any changes, thank you.

KnightRangersGuild@Nexus
author: KnightRangersGuild
